term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - asymmetry potential of a glass electrode
term.title: asymmetry potential

item.text: The measured potential difference of a symmetrical cell with identical solutions and reference electrodes on each side of the glass membrane. There is rarely the need, nor the possibility, of measuring the asymmetry potential of commercial glass electrodes. Drifts in glass electrode potentials with time and variations from day to day in the potential measured in a standard buffer may be attributed to changes in asymmetry potential.
